message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a one-of-a-kind product that's worth $1,000,000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,200,000. This is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
Hello Alice, thanks for your offer. While I believe the product has value, the price is a little high for me. I'd be willing to offer $800,000 for it.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm afraid $800,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1,000,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, and I believe it's still a fair deal for both of us.
